title: Bloody Battle for Japan: Imperial Conquest - Shogun 2 Total War: Fall of the Samurai Gameplay
description:
Today we are playing Shogun 2 Total War.  This is an online battle in avatar conquest.  Both armies are imperial, and the battle will be determined through a cloud of smoke.  This is also the very awesome DLC called Fall of the Samurai. Enjoy the battle :D 


If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
